ðŸ“– Summary: OpenLDK is a JIT compiler and runtime for Java implemented in Common Lisp. It translates Java bytecode into Lisp code, which is then compiled into native machine code. This allows for seamless integration of Java libraries into Lisp projects, mapping Java classes to CLOS classes.
